UPDATE site_incoming_material_temp_warning set warning_state=#{warningState} where fie_id=(SELECT id from site_field_material_mgt where batch_id=#{id}) and delete_state=1
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1a.* FROM plan_production_collection a LEFT JOIN plan_construction_deviation b ON b.id = a.piancha_id WHERE a.road_id = ( SELECT road_id FROM batch_mgt WHERE id =(SELECT batch_id from site_field_material_mgt WHERE id=(SELECT fie_id from site_incoming_material_temp_warning where id=#{id}) ) ) AND a.delete_state = 1 ORDER BY a.datetime DESC
SELECT batch_id as batchId from site_field_material_mgt WHERE id=(SELECT fie_id from site_incoming_material_temp_warning where id=#{id})

select a.warning_content as reason,b.weight as pitch_weight,c.pitch_type,c.loading_weight,d.fl_name from site_incoming_material_temp_warning as a LEFT JOIN site_field_material_mgt as b on a.fie_id=b.id AND b.delete_state=1 LEFT JOIN batch_mgt c on c.id=b.batch_id AND c.delete_state=1 LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management d ON d.fl_id= c.pitch_type and d.delete_state = 1 WHERE a.id=#{id}

SELECT top 1 simtw.*,sfm.fl_name,bm.batch,srm.road_name,srm.road_no,uu.u_name FROM site_incoming_material_temp_warning simtw LEFT JOIN site_field_material_mgt sfmm ON simtw.fie_id = sfmm.id and sfmm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN batch_mgt bm ON sfmm.batch_id = bm.id and bm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_road_mgn srm ON bm.road_id = srm.road_id and srm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm ON sfm.fl_id= bm.pitch_type and sfm.delete_state = 1 LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON uu.user_id= simtw.edit_user_id and uu.delete_state = 1 where simtw.delete_state=1 and bm.batch=#{batch} and simtw.warning_state=0 ORDER BY simtw.datetime desc

SELECT simtw.*,sfm.fl_name,bm.batch,srm.road_name,srm.road_no,uu.u_name FROM site_incoming_material_temp_warning simtw LEFT JOIN site_field_material_mgt sfmm ON simtw.fie_id = sfmm.id and sfmm.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN batch_mgt bm ON sfmm.batch_id = bm.id and bm.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN sys_road_mgn srm ON bm.road_id = srm.road_id and srm.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN sys_formulation_management sfm ON sfm.fl_id= bm.pitch_type and sfm.delete_state != 0 LEFT JOIN u_user uu ON uu.user_id= simtw.edit_user_id and uu.delete_state = 1 where simtw.delete_state !=0 AND simtw.fie_id in( SELECT id from site_field_material_mgt where delete_state!= 0 and batch_id IN(SELECT id from batch_mgt where road_id=#{roadId}) )
